name: Magic Paper
description:
You can use magic by attaching a magic piece containing magic to a magic book.


Attaching a Magic piece of the same magic will enhance that magic.


If you don't like the shape of the magic piece, you can reshape it at the magic altar.



When you complete a magic sigil with magic pieces, the effect of the magic paper is triggerd.


You can exchange magic sigils.


You can change the order of your skills by dragging and dropping the icons in the skill slots.



You can explore dungeons with unique monsters and bosses.


You can teleport to the room you passed by by clicking the icon on the minimap.


In the dungeon, you can trade with goblins who sell potions and magic pieces.


Collect gems from bosses and enter the Devil Castle to defeat the Dark Lord!
